name: Journey's Legend
description:
Embark on an epic adventure in Journey's Legend! Choose from four unique characters, each armed with their own set of three powerful active abilities and a devastating ultimate ability.

Unlock new relics and enhance your character's abilities by completing challenging achievements (ACVs), creating a limitless array of possibilities for your character builds. Experiment, strategize, and dominate the battlefield with your personally crafted hero. But beware, as the enemies you face grow stronger with each level, testing your skills and tactics to the fullest.
